snippet: With three kids and constant travel for work, John Hussey jumped at the chance to play an open-world adventure game like "The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild" anywhere, anytime....

headline.main: In Atlanta, Anti-Semitism Is Viewed Through Lens of History
headline.print_headline: In Atlanta, Anti-Semitism Is Viewed Through Lens of History

lead_paragraph: With three kids and constant travel for work, John Hussey jumped at the chance to play an open-world adventure game like "The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild" anywhere, anytime.
